DESCRIPTION: This amount of cards from the top of your draw pile are revealed. NL Max of #b7, lose #b1 #yAugury at the start of each turn.
Cards from the top of your draw pile that are displayed by #yAugury.
Gain the additional effect if this is the first #yFated card you play in a turn.
#yExhausts when played and the value is reduced by 1. When this reaches 0, remove it from your deck completely.
When played, ALL cards with #yEntropy will deal #b1 additional #ydamage or gain #b1 additional #yBlock for the rest of combat.
